synopsis.text: Tachikawa Tetsuya, a freshman passionate about archery, finds his expectations challenged when a new transfer student joins his class. Despite rumors of the arrival being a male student, Tetsuya meets Sasaki Gonzaburou - presenting as a cute girl but actually identifying as a boy who prefers wearing female outfits. harboring an unspoken connection to Tetsuya's late grandfather Fudou, the talented archer. Gonzaburou's feminine appearance and hidden mysteries pique Tetsuya's interest as Gonzaburou petitions to join the school archery club. Though initially taken aback, Tetsuya comes to appreciate his new classmate's unique perspective and talents. Together, the two first-years seek to hone their skills and unravel the untold stories binding their families through the sport they both love.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
